div.p: Centennial changes as a function of month from CESM1 special simulation with fixed sea-ice cover. Same as Fig. 7 except for the 1%-per-year CO 2 run with fixed sea-ice in calculating the ice–atmosphere and ice–ocean fluxes (FixedIce run). Note the upward longwave radiation change (LW_up) is plotted on the right y-axis in a– c here. d Time-dependent warming and sea-ice loss from CESM1 simulation with fixed sea-ice cover. Same as Fig. 3d except for the CESM1 FixedIce run
